title: I love typophile
content:

comments.content: Thanks a lot. I now have a crick in my neck!

\> Thanks a lot. I now have a crick in my neck!  
So, I have to massage it with [Flowers](http://web.archive.org/web/20080827235500/http:/www.crauswords.com/flowers/WFlowers.htm).

Satya, Thank you. Thank you. Thank you. Did I say Thank you?  
Sii, You massage yours. And I massage mine?!  
Bets Wishes to All Typophiles
